A lightbox displays an image filling the screen, and dimming out the rest of the web page. It acts as a modal dialog using the <dialog> element as a container for the lightbox. Click on one of the images to open the lightbox. Browse images in the lightbox using arrow keys, clicking on one of the navigation buttons, or by dragging or swiping the image.
